title: Icon's and Wards Rewards not going through (Halloween event 2016)
body:
I recently did the requirements for the little devil Teemo Icon and the Doomed Minion Icon yet haven't received them yet. 
I have some friends who have however.
Unlock for your account by defeating Doom Bots of Doom by 11/3/2016 at 23:59 PT and, 
Unlock for your account by summoning Little Devil Teemo by 11/3/2016 at 23:59 PT. 

I also checked some old halloween threads in 2013 that had someone suggest you change your icon to refresh your list of icons, but this doesn't work.
I figured it'd be an idea to check with some of the people in the people in the know if things are going through proper with these icons if some are receiving it and others aren't.
Is there some sort of Q order to this?

replies.body:
As others have mentioned here, the fine print on the [official announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016) states the following:

>"Icons will be granted up to two weeks after November 3, 2016 at 23:59 PT."

Let me know if you have any other questions.
did you not read the above text it can take up to 2 weeks after the event is finnished to give all the rewards so calm down and whait :3
You have to wait a few weeks for the icons to be sent to your account.
